con:request.name: AddAchToken
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:tem="http://tempuri.org/" xmlns:acr="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.EPayment.VirtualTerminal.Common" xmlns:acr1="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.Client.Tokens.v2.Common.Requests" xmlns:acr2="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.Client.Tokens.v2.Common" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <tem:AddAchToken> <tem:request> <acr:MerchantId>12721628</acr:MerchantId> <acr:Password>Ros@parks@1955</acr:Password> <acr:UserId>cenpos</acr:UserId> <acr1:GeoLocationInformation xsi:nil="true" /> <acr1:IMEI xsi:nil="true" /> <acr1:ReferenceNumber xsi:nil="true" /> <acr1:Token> <acr2:CustomerBillingAddress>${CustomerAddress}</acr2:CustomerBillingAddress> <acr2:CustomerCode>${CustomerCode}</acr2:CustomerCode> <acr2:CustomerEmailAddress>jestrella@cenpos.com</acr2:CustomerEmailAddress> <acr2:CustomerZipCode>${CustomerZipCode}</acr2:CustomerZipCode> <acr2:MerchantId>12721628</acr2:MerchantId> <acr2:Signature>${CustomerSignature}</acr2:Signature> <acr2:TokenId xsi:nil="true" /> <acr2:ABANumber>067006432</acr2:ABANumber> <acr2:AccountNumber>2000022326422</acr2:AccountNumber> <acr2:AccountType>Checking</acr2:AccountType> <acr2:BirthDay xsi:nil="true" /> <acr2:CheckType>Corporate</acr2:CheckType> <acr2:City xsi:nil="true" /> <acr2:DriversNumber xsi:nil="true" /> <acr2:FirstName xsi:nil="true" /> <acr2:InsuranceInformation xsi:nil="true" /> <acr2:LastName xsi:nil="true" /> <acr2:Phone>3056307960</acr2:Phone> <acr2:State xsi:nil="true" /> </acr1:Token> </tem:request> </tem:AddAchToken> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: Copy of AddAchToken
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:tem="http://tempuri.org/" xmlns:acr="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.EPayment.VirtualTerminal.Common" xmlns:acr1="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.Client.Tokens.v2.Common.Requests" xmlns:acr2="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.Client.Tokens.v2.Common" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <tem:AddAchToken> <tem:request> <acr:MerchantId>${MerchantId}</acr:MerchantId> <acr:Password>${Password}</acr:Password> <acr:UserId>${UserId}</acr:UserId> <acr1:GeoLocationInformation xsi:nil="true" /> <acr1:IMEI xsi:nil="true" /> <acr1:ReferenceNumber xsi:nil="true" /> <acr1:Token> <acr2:CustomerBillingAddress>${CustomerAddress}</acr2:CustomerBillingAddress> <acr2:CustomerCode>${DataSource - Cards#ClientId}</acr2:CustomerCode> <acr2:CustomerEmailAddress>${DataSource - Cards#ClientId}@${DataSource - Cards#ClientId}.zzz</acr2:CustomerEmailAddress> <acr2:CustomerZipCode>${CustomerZipCode}</acr2:CustomerZipCode> <acr2:MerchantId>${MerchantId}</acr2:MerchantId> <acr2:Signature>${CustomerSignature}</acr2:Signature> <acr2:TokenId xsi:nil="true" /> <acr2:ABANumber>?</acr2:ABANumber> <acr2:AccountNumber>?</acr2:AccountNumber> <acr2:AccountType>?</acr2:AccountType> <acr2:BirthDay xsi:nil="true" /> <acr2:CheckType>?</acr2:CheckType> <acr2:City>?</acr2:City> <acr2:DriversNumber>?</acr2:DriversNumber> <acr2:FirstName>?</acr2:FirstName> <acr2:InsuranceInformation xsi:nil="true" /> <acr2:LastName>?</acr2:LastName> <acr2:Phone>?</acr2:Phone> <acr2:State>?</acr2:State> </acr1:Token> </tem:request> </tem:AddAchToken> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>
